To set this up in your Google Docs: open a doc, open Tools>Script Editor, copy github.com/Nyzl/1i files apart from longSentences.js, rename each .js to .gs, save as 1i, write text into your Google Doc, Add-ons>1i. It's fab - thank you @AlecIJohnson and @mr_i_an @AlecIJohnson/1064528982023053312
